title: Kisan Call Centre (KCC) - Transcripts of farmers queries & answers

records.QueryText: Better banana development in Banana Plant
records.KccAns:
Recommended to use BANANA SPECIAL
Soil Application: Apply 20 kg per acre in two splits, the first split of 15 kg per acre three months after transplanting.
The second split of 5 kg per acre at five to six months after transplanting.
Advise to call mandi help line number-1967
Advised to contact Forest department for control of elephants and to get compensation money for your loss.

(Offline) :- Visit the Nearest Office: Farmers can visit the nearest Common Service Centre (CSC) or the office of the Block Agriculture Officer (BAO) to apply offline; Fill Out the Application Form: The officer will provide an application form that needs to be filled out with details such as name, landholding, Aadhaar number, and crop information; Attach Necessary Documents: Attach the required documents like a photocopy of the Aadhaar card, land documents, and a passport-sized photo; Submit the Form: Submit the form at the office for processing. The authorities will verify the details, and once verified, the Farmer ID will be generated.

Documents required :- 1. Aadhaar Card: This is essential for identity verification, 2. Landholding Documents: Proof of ownership or lease of agricultural land, 3. Bank Account Details: A copy of the farmer’s bank passbook, 4. Photograph: A recent passport-sized photograph, 5. Mobile Number: For communication and updates, 6. Proof of Residence: If applicable, a proof of residence such as a voter ID or ration card.

records.QueryText: Can grow watermelon in river bed now
records.KccAns: Yes you can grow watermelon in river bed now.

records.QueryText: Paddy supply and token details of mandi for 2024 Kharif.
records.KccAns: Advised to contact 1967 to enquiry for paddy supply and token details of mandi for 2024 Kharif.

Recommended to spray Copper Oxychloride 600 g + Plantomycin 200 g in 200 litre of water per 1 acre of land (Copper Oxychloride @ 45 g + Plantomycin 15 g in 15 Litre water) to control leaf blight in potato.
Recommended to spray Copper Oxychloride 50% WP @ 600 g in 200 liter of water per acre of land for control BUD ROT in Coconut.
Recommended to spray Copper Oxychloride 50% WP @ 600 g in 200 liter of water per acre of land for control BUD ROT in Coconut.

Soil
Sandy loam rich in organic matter with good drainage and pH range from 6.5-7.5.

Season
Planting spreads during July and January

Seed rate
Variety: 2 kg/ha and hybrids -1kg/ha. Sow the seeds (3 seeds/pit) treated with Trichoderma viride @ 4 g or Pseudomonas fluorescens @ 10g/kg of seeds and thin the seedlings to two per pit after 15 days..

Seed treatment
The seeds are treated with Trichoderma viride 4 g or Pseudomonas fluorescens 10 g / kg of seeds before sowing.

Preparation of field
Plough the field to fine tilth.  Dig pits of 30 cm x 30 cm x 30 cm size at 2.5 x 2 m spacing and form basins.

Sowing
Sow the seeds (5 seeds / pit) and thin the seedlings to two/ pit after 15 days.
Recommended to plant Priya, Supriya, VNR ( Krish, Kumud) , Nuziveedu seeds ( Karisma, Kiran, Shalini), Tata ( Zara, Naira,003).
CM kisan status--Applicant has no ration card, please apply for ration card
Recommended to apply 50 kg DAP+35 kg MOP +25 kg Zypmite plus per acre as Basal dose in Pumpkin
Weather forecast in Balangir district at Loisinga block- There is possibility of no rainfall for next 3 days with partly cloudy weather.Advised to go for parboiling of rice as per weather forecast.
Advised to visit Jana Seva Kendra and apply for ration card to avail benefits of both CM KISAN and PM KISAN scheme.

records.QueryType: Animal Production (Piggery, Goatery, Sheep Farming etc.)

records.QueryText: Dose and time of application of MULTIPLEX PLANT AID in green gram
records.KccAns: Advise to spray 2 gram MULTIPLEX PLANT AID  per  1 L of water  in green gram.

TULIP :-  specialized plant growth regulator (PGR) that combines Auxin and Cytokinin in a unique composition designed to enhance fruit and flower setting, development, and growth. Its distinctive formula provides high synergism with other PGRs, making it compatible and easy to apply with agro- and bio-chemicals commonly used in agriculture and horticulture.  Composition  :- Auxin and Cytokinin supplements in a concentration of 0.3% (w/v) EC in organic solvents.    Application :-  Flowering Stage: Use 0.5-1.0 ml of Tulip per liter of water for spraying or dipping and Post Fruit Setting Stage: Use 1-3 ml of Tulip per liter of water for spraying or dipping to enhance fruit size and quality.

records.QueryText: Post emergence weed management in groundnut
records.KccAns: Recommended to spray Dhanuka Tornado (Quizalofop ethyl 7.5% + Imazethapyr 15% EC) @ 7-8 ml/ 15 liter water
Recommended to spray Pyrazosulphuron ethyl 10% WP ( Saathi ) @ 80 g per 200 litre of water per 1 acre of land (6 g per 15 litre of water) for weed management in Paddy.

Advise to wait as your status showing ok

records.QueryText: Nutrient management in tomato for better flowering and fruiting

Advised to contact the helpline number 1967 for Dhana Mandi related queries.

records.QueryText: Farmer asking about to know his PM KISAN status
records.KccAns: You are not comfortable to share OTP with us. Without OTP we can not check your PM KISAN status

records.QueryText: farmer is asking about the registration process of pm kisan
records.KccAns: if you having only leased land then it is not possible to do registration in PM KISAN, whatever if may be bareminimum land also and its your own then only you can apply for PM KISAN from your nearest CSC.

records.QueryText: Query  regarding PM Kisan adhar bank seeding status
records.KccAns: Kindly contact to bank and nearest agriculture office.

records.QueryText: Asked about Leaf spot Disease management in Green gram
records.KccAns:
Suggested to spray mancozeb @ 2 gm per lit of water. or Tebuconazole 25.9% EC @ 2 ml per ltr of water.
ಪ್ರತಿ ಲೀಟರ್ ನೀರಿಗೆ 2 ಗ್ರಾಂನಂತೆ ಮ್ಯಾಂಕೋಜೆಬ್ ಸಿಂಪಡಿಸಲು ಸೂಚಿಸಲಾಗಿದೆ. ಅಥವಾ ಪ್ರತಿ ಲೀಟರ್ ನೀರಿಗೆ 2 ಮಿಲೀನಂತೆ ಟೆಬುಕೊನಜೋಲ್ 25.9% ಇಸಿ ಸಿಂಪಡಿಸಲು ಸೂಚಿಸಲಾಗಿದೆ.

records.KccAns: --Suggested to contact RSK or Agriculture department OR PM-Kisan Helpline No. 155261 / 011-24300606  You can contact the PM Kisan Samman Nidhi program by email at pmkisan-ict@gov.in. ಅಗತ್ಯ ಮಾಹಿತಿ ನೀಡಿ ಆರ್. ಎಸ್. ಕೆ. ಅಥವಾ ಕೃಷಿ ಇಲಾಖೆಯನ್ನು ಸಂಪರ್ಕಿಸಲು ಸೂಚಿಸಲಾಗಿದೆ ಅಥವಾPM-Kisan Helpline No. 155261 / 011-24300606   ರೈತ ಕಾಲ್ ಸೆಂಟರ್ ಟೋಲ್ ಫ್ರೀ ಸಂಖ್ಯೆಃ 1800 425 3553.

records.QueryText: asked about nutrient management in arecanut
records.KccAns: Suggested ti give NPK 10-26-26 fertilizer and also micro nutrient mixture (Arka special ) .NPK 10-26-26 ರಸಗೊಬ್ಬರವನ್ನು ಮತ್ತು ಸೂಕ್ಷ್ಮ ಪೋಷಕಾಂಶಗಳ ಮಿಶ್ರಣವನ್ನು (ಅರ್ಕಾ ವಿಶೇಷ) ನೀಡಲು ಸೂಚಿಸಲಾಗಿದೆ.
--Information is given and suggested to contact Agriculture department  18004253553

Necessary information given to farmer ರೈತರಿಗೆ ಅಗತ್ಯ ಮಾಹಿತಿ ನೀಡಲಾಗಿದೆ.
Suggested to visit RSK /Agriculture dept at your Hobli level or taluk level 
ನಿಮ್ಮ ಹೋಬಳಿ ಮಟ್ಟದಲ್ಲಿ ಅಥವಾ ತಾಲೂಕು ಮಟ್ಟದಲ್ಲಿ RSK/ಕೃಷಿ ಇಲಾಖೆಗೆ ಭೇಟಿ ನೀಡಲು ಸೂಚಿಸಲಾಗಿದೆ

OR

Agriculture officer Shimoga Kasaba  8277932620
Assistant Agricultural Officer  Nidige  8277932622

records.QueryText: asked about plant protection in kolleroga in arecanut
records.KccAns:
--Organic Treatments for Arecanut Kolle Roga (Mahali Disease):
Organic Fungicides:
Trichoderma-based products,Garlic or Ginger Extract,Compost Tea or Cow Urine,Cultural Practices:Proper Drainage,..

ನಿಮ್ಮ ತಾಲೂಕಿನಲ್ಲಿ ಇಂದು  ತುಂತುರು ಮಳೆಯಾಗುವ ಸಾಧ್ಯತೆ ಇಲ್ಲ (2%). ಹೆಚ್ಚಿನ ಮಾಹಿತಿಗೆ ವರುಣಮಿತ್ರ 08067735999 or 9243345433 ಸಂಪರ್ಕಿಸಬಹುದು. There is no chance of rain (2 %) in your taluka today. For more information, contact Varun Mitra 08067735999 or 9243345433.

records.QueryText: Asked about Selection of Field for Pepper Growing ?
records.KccAns:
Selection of Field
Fields having sloppy towards north east is suitable for black pepper cultivation.
It will prevent the damage to the vines from south - west filter light.
ಸ್ಥಳದ ಆಯ್ಕೆ ಮತ್ತುಆಧಾರ ಮರ ಬೆಳೆಸಿವುದು
ಕರಿಮೆಣಸಿನ ತೋಟ ಮಾಡಲು ಸ್ವಲ್ಪ ಇಳಿಜಾರು ಇರುವ ಪ್ರದೇಶವನ್ನು ಆಯ್ಕೆ ಮಾಡುವುದು ವಾಡಿಕೆ.
ಆದರೆ ಇಳಿಜಾರಿನ ದಿಕ್ಕು ದಕ್ಷಿಣಾಭಿಮುಖವಾಗಿದ್ದಲ್ಲಿ ಆ ಸ್ಥಳದ ಆಯ್ಕೆ ಸೂಕ್ತವಲ್ಲ.
ಇಳಿಜಾರಿನ ಕೆಳಗಿನ ಅರ್ಧಭಾಗ ಉತ್ತರಾಭಿಮುಖವಾಗಿದ್ದು, ಇಲ್ಲವೇ ಉತ್ತರ-ಪೂರ್ವಾಭಿಮುಖವಾಗಿದ್ದಲ್ಲಿ ಅಂತಹ ಪ್ರದೇಶಗಳನ್ನು ನಾಟಿಮಾಡಲು ಆಯ್ಕೆ ಮಾಡಿಕೊಳ್ಳುವುದು ಸೂಕ್ತ.
ಇದರಿಂದ ಬೇಸಿಗೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ದಕ್ಷಿಣ-ಪಶ್ಚಿಮ ಕಡೆಯಿಂದ ಸೂಸುವ ಬಿಸಿಲಿನ ತಾಪದಿಂದ ಬಳ್ಳಿಗಳಿಗಾಗುವ ಹಾನಿಯನ್ನು ತಪ್ಪಿಸಬಹುದು.

Suggested to call after getting Registration number
ನೋಂದಣಿ ಸಂಖ್ಯೆಯನ್ನು ಪಡೆದ ನಂತರ ಕರೆ ಮಾಡಲು ಸೂಚಿಸಲಾಗಿದೆ

ನಿಮ್ಮ ತಾಲೂಕಿನಲ್ಲಿ ಇಂದು ಮಳೆಯಾಗುವ ಸಾಧ್ಯತೆ ಇಲ್ಲ(20%) ಮೋಡ ಕವಿದ ವಾತಾವರಣ ಮುಂದುವರಿಯಲಿದೆ.  ಹೆಚ್ಚಿನ ಮಾಹಿತಿಗೆ ವರುಣ ಮಿತ್ರ 08067735999 or 9243345433 ಸಂಪರ್ಕಿಸಬಹುದು.There is no chance of rain in your taluk today (20%) cloudy weather will continue.  For more information contact Varuna Mitra 080-22745232/34 or 9243345433.

records.QueryText: Asked about PM Kisan Samman yojana
records.KccAns: The 19th installment of the PM-Kisan Samman Nidhi Yojana is scheduled for release between December and March. The date of release will be announced shortly.

Given necessary information and suggested to visit Raitha Samparka Kendra or Agricultural Department(Assistant agricultural directorate office)or suggested to contact Farmer Call Center Toll Free No: 1800 425 3553
